billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Directs the commissioner of health to promulgate rules and regulations for the labeling of prescription drugs in other than English
summary: Directs the commissioner of health to promulgate rules and regulations for the labeling of prescription drugs in other than English.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3662

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 26, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. CAMARA, BARRON, BOYLAND -- Multi-Sponsored by --
         M. of A. COOK, McDONOUGH, MENG, PERRY -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Consumer Affairs and Protection

       AN ACT to amend the public  health  law,  in  relation  to  labeling  of
         prescription drugs in languages other than English

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Section 206 of the public health law is amended by adding a
    2  new subdivision 28 to read as follows:
    3    28. THE COMMISSIONER SHALL PROMULGATE BY RULE AND REGULATION  CRITERIA
    4  DIRECTING  PHARMACIES  TO  PROVIDE  PRESCRIPTION  BOTTLE  LABELS,  WHICH
    5  INCLUDE INSTRUCTIONS FOR TAKING THE MEDICINE, IN  LANGUAGES  OTHER  THAN
    6  ENGLISH.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred twentieth day after
    8  it shall have become a law. Provided, however, that effective immediate-
    9  ly,  the  addition,  amendment  and/or  repeal of any rule or regulation
   10  necessary for the implementation of this act on its effective  date  are
   11  authorized  and  directed  to  be  made  and completed on or before such
   12  effective date.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03998-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to labeling of prescription drugs in languages other than English
